titleStmt.title: A parlie with the sword about a cessation, as it was delivered in a sermon at a publick fast in the church of Great Yarmouth in Norfolk, Decemb. 28. 1642. / By Iohn Brinsley, minister of the Word, and pastour of an adjacent congregation. Published for common use.
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, 1600-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for John Burroughes, and are to be sold at his shop at the Golden Dragon neare the Inner-Temple gate in Fleet streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Golden Dragon neare the Inner-Temple gate in Fleet streete
